desc:
{c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Stunned enemies. Double this amount when using two Maces.{if:SF_7}

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}{SF_5}%{/c} chance to gain {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_6} |2|]{/c} seconds when you hit a Stunned enemy. Double this chance when using two Maces.{/if}
name: One-Handed Mace Expertise
